000101 00000 00001 0000000000000111 -- r1 = r0 | 7
110000 00001 00000 0000000000000111 -- jmp to inst7 if r1 == 0
000000 00010 00010 0000000000000110 -- r2 = r2 + 6
000001 00001 00001 0000000000000001 -- r1 = r1 - 1
010100 00000 00011 0000000000000001 -- r3 = nextPC, jmp to inst1
010010 00010 00000 0000000000000001 -- print r2 (r2 must be 0d42, ASCII '*')
010010 00000 00000 0000000000000011 -- halt
010100 00011 00000 0000000000000000 -- r0 = nextPC, jmp to r3
